item.title: Typography
item.description: Typeface Bula's uses the open-source typface Nunito Sans. Nunito Sans can be downloaded from the official Google Fonts library. Nunito Sans 400 Nunito Sans 600 Nunito Sans 700 Size Body has a variety of sizes available with text-body-01 which will display content at the base font size. Pure Fiji brings you the best of these ancient traditions combined with advanced technology for today's natural body care.
